creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: male figure with his back to viewer wearing coat with slashed sleeves; PR hand holding large staff; sword scabbard visible at PR hip
marks: Signature, Mark monogram in plate, upper right: [ICB]
provenance: Paul Davidsohn (sales 1920-21); John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Soldier with Halberd, Seen from the Back
